Author: ryan king
Comment:
Of course, there’s [tagging](http://technorati.com/tags/).

There’s [hcard and hcalendar conversion](http://suda.co.uk/projects/X2V).

There’s search engines [ignoring some links](http://googleblog.blogspot.com/2005/01/preventing-comment-spam.html).

I know, there are no huge-multi-billion dollar apps which are based around microformats technology, but my assertion that we’ve shown the technical viablity of microformats still holds. Microformats are easy implement and *easy enough* to parse.
